title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1481/94 of 27 June 1994 amending for the ninth time Regulation (EC) No 3337/93 adopting exceptional support measures for the market in pigmeat in Belgium
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1481/94 of 27 June 1994 amending for the ninth time Regulation (EC) No 3337/93 adopting exceptional support measures for the market in pigmeat in Belgium
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Regulation (EC) No 3337/93 is hereby amended as follows:

This Regulation shall enter into force on 28 June 1994.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 June 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 282, 1. 11. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 129, 11. 5. 1989, p. 12.
(3) OJ No L 299, 4. 12. 1993, p. 23.
(4) OJ No L 152, 18. 6. 1994, p. 24.
